leagues.name: New Nations Cup
leagues.description: Play as a team to represent your nation!

leagues.name: AWP World Tour
leagues.description: Prove your worth on a series of pro level tournaments

leagues.description: A seasonal group of round-robin Warzone tournaments, always on the classic “strategic medium earth” map and settings with 0% weighted random luck

leagues.name: Clan Cup
leagues.description: Tournament to decide who is the best active clan right now

leagues.description: Seasonal round robin tournaments on the Small Earth template

leagues.name: Multi Template Ladder (MTL)

leagues.name: Ligue France 33
leagues.description: A competition among French speaking players

leagues.name: USA League 1
leagues.description: A league for all American citizens and people who currently live in the United States.

leagues.name: Strat ME Ladder
leagues.description: Alternative to Fizzer's 1v1 MME ladder. We play on the much better template Strat ME with a much better rating system (Elo)..

leagues.name: Mankind Series
leagues.description: Challenging scenarios from the dawn of mankind 350k years ago to current times.
